title: 1.7.10服务端崩溃求助！
author: king丶北辰
txt_content:

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
直接
打开文件夹 config/ 中的文件 forge.cfg ，将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码

replies.author: king丶北辰
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 king丶北辰 于 2019-12-1 11:34 编辑

replies.author: mcvimik
replies.txt_content:
mcvimik 发表于 2019-12-1 11:40
World: (61,63,696), Chunk: (at 13,3,8 in 3,43; contains blocks 48,0,688 to 63,255,703), Region: (0,1 ...
不会删除区块的话可以删除region文件

进入 world文件夹  找到region  找到0,1.mca
删除重启即可
